condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Strategies to address cross-cutting sociocultural issues relating to children’s rights are implemented.

description.narrative: A total of 154 (51%) Community Engagement and Participation Platforms were set-up in both emergency and development settings. SBCC strategy focused on KRCs was implemented and over 18 million (88%) people reached with messages on COVID-19 prevention and access to care and treatment. To meet C4D five quality benchmarks, technical support at both upstream and operational level for behaviors and social norms changes was provided to Government institutions, civil society organizations and communities. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:30/06/2020

title.narrative: Communication and community engagement platforms/ mechanisms supported by UNICEF meet quality standards across development priorities
Communication platforms or networks supported by UNICEF meet quality standards for children and adolescent engagement and participation across development priorities

Capacity development strategy under implementation to strengthen and institutionalize C4D skills of government, implementing partners staff at national level and subnational level meets quality standards
Number of RCCE messages produced and disseminated with UNICEF support, adapted for target groups, in the reporting year [COVID]
Number of people sharing their concerns and asking questions/clarifications for available support services to address their needs through established feedback mechanisms [COVIDSitRep]
Number of people reached on COVID-19 through messaging on prevention and access to services [COVIDSitRep]
Number of people who participate in COVID-19 engagement actions [COVIDSitRep]
Generation and use of social, behavioural and communication data and evidence meets quality standards for informing and monitoring C4D strategies in Country Programme priorities
C4D support for upstream programmme/policy advocacy on priority behaviors and social norms meets quality standards
UNICEF-supported Government-led coordination mechanism/s for C4D meet/s quality standards
